channel.title: Posts on NetKet
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on NetKet

item.title: NetKet-friendly Summer School in Toulouse
item.description: We are glad to advertise that our dear colleagues in Toulouse are organising a Summer school in April on Machine Learning techniques for Quantum Many-Body Physics. The school will feature several lectures and tutorials on NetKet. On Below you can find the original announcement. Announcement Toulouse School on Machine Learning for Quantum Many-Body Physics that will take place in Toulouse, France (4th-8th April 2022). The school will take place in hybrid format (with both online and onsite students and lecturers).
